'''Minecraft Brain Games''' is a ''Minecraft'' quiz book, designed to test intelligence.<ref>https://www.amazon.ca/Minecraft-Brain-Games-illustrated-childrens/dp/0008680582</ref>

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
'''Go on an epic adventure across the Overworld, solving Minecraft puzzles as you go.'''

Embark on a wild journey through the [[Overworld]], tackling [[Mob|mobs]], hunting for treasure and striving to survive. Solve sudokus to fill your [[inventory]], crack codes to translate [[Villager|villagers]] and follow [[Iron Golem|iron golems]] through mazes to locate [[Village|villages]]. Will you be able to muddle your way through this adventure and puzzle your way to the end of the story?
}}
